║                           WORKFLOW SCHEDULES                                   ║
╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣
║ Hourly Trading Run                                                              ║
║   Schedule: Every hour at :00 minutes (00:00, 01:00, etc. UTC)                 ║
║   Can trigger manually: Yes                                                    ║
║   Runs on: Push to main with config/trading changes                            ║
║   Output: Artifacts (30-day retention), Slack notifications                    ║
║                                                                                 ║
║ Tests & Validation                                                              ║
║   Schedule: On every push/PR to main/develop                                   ║
║   Tests: Lint, unit tests, config validation, security, dependencies          ║
║   Output: Test reports, coverage metrics                                       ║

║                        GITHUB ACTIONS FREE TIER                                ║
╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣
║ Public repos:   ∞ (unlimited minutes)                                          ║
║ Private repos:  2,000 minutes/month free                                       ║
║                                                                                 ║
║ Your hourly runs: ~7,200-10,800 min/month                                     ║
║ → EXCEEDS FREE TIER if private repo                                            ║
║                                                                                 ║
║ Solutions:                                                                      ║
║ • Change to every 6 hours: cron: '0 */6 * * *'  (~1,500-2,200 min/month)     ║
║ • Upgrade to GitHub Pro: ~$4/month (3,000 min/month)                          ║
║ • Use self-hosted runner: No minutes consumed                                  ║

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                         HOW TO VIEW RESULTS                                    ║
╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣
║ 1. GitHub repo → Actions tab                                                  ║
║ 2. Click workflow name → Click specific run                                    ║
║ 3. View logs: Click job name (e.g., "trading-run")                             ║
║ 4. Download artifacts: Scroll to "Artifacts" section                           ║
║    • trading-results-[ID]  - Trading simulation output                         ║
║    • merged-data-[ID]      - Merged stock/trading data                        ║

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                        COMMON CRON SCHEDULES                                   ║
╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣
║ Edit: .github/workflows/hourly-trading.yml → Change cron value                 ║
║                                                                                 ║
║ Every hour:         cron: '0 * * * *'        ← CURRENT                         ║
║ Every 6 hours:      cron: '0 */6 * * *'      ← Recommended for free tier      ║
║ Every 4 hours:      cron: '0 */4 * * *'                                        ║
║ Daily 9 AM UTC:     cron: '0 9 * * *'                                          ║
║ Weekdays 10 AM:     cron: '0 10 * * 1-5'                                       ║
║ Monday 8 AM:        cron: '0 8 * * 1'                                          ║
║                                                                                 ║
║ Cron format: minute hour day-of-month month day-of-week                        ║
